languages.text: {n}На мгновение глубокая морщина прорезает лоб проктора.{/n} "Твой брат, значит. Как же на этом мире все запутанно".
{n}For a brief moment, a deep wrinkle cuts across Solomorne's forehead.{/n} "So, your brother is not his usual self. This world is a tangled web indeed."
languages.original_text: {n}На мгновение глубокая морщина прорезает лоб проктора.{/n} "Твой брат, значит. Как же на этом мире все запутанно".

traits.locale_text: {n}For a brief moment, a deep wrinkle cuts across the Proctor's forehead.{/n} "So your brother is not his usual self. This world is tangled web, indeed."
{n}For a brief moment, a deep wrinkle cuts across the Proctor's forehead.{/n} "So, your brother is not his usual self. This world is a tangled web indeed."
{n}For a brief moment, a deep wrinkle cuts across the Proctor's forehead.{/n} "So, your brother is not his usual self. This world is a tangled web indeed."
{n}For a brief moment, a deep wrinkle cuts across Solomorne's forehead.{/n} "So, your brother is not his usual self. This world is a tangled web indeed."
{n}For a brief moment, a deep wrinkle cuts across Solomorne's forehead.{/n} "So, your brother is not his usual self. This world is a tangled web indeed."

languages.text: {n}Für einen kurzen Moment durchzieht eine tiefe Falte Solomornes Stirn.{/n} "Euer Bruder ist also nicht er selbst. Diese Welt ist in der Tat ein Spinnennetz."
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, a deep wrinkle cuts across Solomorne's forehead.{/n} "So, your brother is not his usual self. This world is a tangled web indeed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Für einen kurzen Moment durchzieht eine tiefe Falte Solomornes Stirn.{/n} "Euer Bruder ist also nicht er selbst. Diese Welt ist in der Tat ein Spinnennetz."

languages.text: {n}L'espace d'un instant, un pli profond barre le front de Solomorne.{/n} « Donc votre frère ne se comporte pas comme à son habitude. Décidément, ce monde est un vrai sac de nœuds. »
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, a deep wrinkle cuts across Solomorne's forehead.{/n} "So, your brother is not his usual self. This world is a tangled web indeed."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'espace d'un instant, un pli profond barre le front de Solomorne.{/n} « Donc votre frère ne se comporte pas comme à son habitude. Décidément, ce monde est un vrai sac de nœuds. »

languages.text: {n}有那么一瞬间，索罗蒙额头上闪过一道深深的皱纹。{/n}“也就是说，你哥哥和往常不一样。这个世界确实像一张错综复杂的网。”
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, a deep wrinkle cuts across Solomorne's forehead.{/n} "So, your brother is not his usual self. This world is a tangled web indeed."

traits.locale_text: {n}有那么一瞬间，索罗蒙额头上闪过一道深深的皱纹。{/n}“也就是说，你哥哥和往常不一样。这个世界确实像一张错综复杂的网。”

languages.text: {n}Por un momento, el ceño de Solomorne se frunce.{/n} «Así que su hermano se comporta de forma extraña. La situación del planeta es más compleja a cada momento».
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, a deep wrinkle cuts across Solomorne's forehead.{/n} "So, your brother is not his usual self. This world is a tangled web indeed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Por un momento, el ceño de Solomorne se frunce.{/n} «Así que su hermano se comporta de forma extraña. La situación del planeta es más compleja a cada momento».

languages.text: {n}一瞬、ソロモーンの額に深い皺がよる。{/n}「つまり、お前の兄はいつもと違うってわけか。まったく、この世界は入り組んでやがるな」
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, a deep wrinkle cuts across Solomorne's forehead.{/n} "So, your brother is not his usual self. This world is a tangled web indeed."

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬、ソロモーンの額に深い皺がよる。{/n}「つまり、お前の兄はいつもと違うってわけか。まったく、この世界は入り組んでやがるな」

languages.text: {n}Kısa bir anlığına Solomorne'un alnında derin bir kırışıklık beliriyor.{/n} "Demek ki kardeşin kendinde değil. Bu dünya gerçekten de karmakarışık bir ağdan farksız."
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, a deep wrinkle cuts across Solomorne's forehead.{/n} "So, your brother is not his usual self. This world is a tangled web indeed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kısa bir anlığına Solomorne'un alnında derin bir kırışıklık beliriyor.{/n} "Demek ki kardeşin kendinde değil. Bu dünya gerçekten de karmakarışık bir ağdan farksız."
